alert.note: Alert for Butler; Elk; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:37AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Elk, Butler and Greenwood Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 437 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Latham, or 10 miles south of Leon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Andover, Augusta, Rose Hill, Eureka, Douglass, Towanda, Benton, Whitewater, Leon, Madison, Howard, Potwin, Moline, Longton, Hamilton, Severy, Elbing, Burns, and Grenola. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
